duties_responsibilities.duty: Operating powered industrial trucks and performing daily checks on equipment prior to operating.
Following all safety guidelines to ensure a safe working environment, reporting faulty equipment, damage to company property, and other safety hazards to the supervisor.
Accurately picking/packing orders, restocking picking bins, sorting, counting, and receiving merchandise.
Safely moving product to and from pallet racks with powered material handling equipment, working with conveyors, and loading/unloading trucks.
Organizing warehouse storage space effectively and adhering to all safety, quality, and production standards.
Working overtime as determined by business needs during the week and/or weekends, and performing other general warehouse tasks as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED; 1-2 years of experience as a certified equipment operator is ideal; knowledge of RF scanners and basic computer skills are preferred.
